reviewText: my grandson Joshua needs help making a sentence over 3 words and this is great to help him open up his vocabulary!  love pam
Classic characters run an obstacle course using opposites at every stop. Entertaining and educational movie for toddlers. My 3 yr old loves to watch in car.
Can't go wrong, My son loves the learning adventures.  Very educational and a good video.  I recommend for any child under 5.
My son is 2,5 and loves this movie. He watches it few times per week. That is one of the best movies I bought for him after "Good night moon" and "The very hungry caterpilar"
My 3 yr. old son loves to watch it over and over again!  Great buy.

my little four year old, he watched it many times, and just loved it.
it could use a little more eduction segments, otherwise it is good for the little ones.

Little one loves it, but he scratched it badly when trying to "do it myself".  So we're back to buy again.  Opposites were memorable and fun for a baby to learn, especially because the Pooh characters were involved.
My daughters love this Winnie the Pooh Movie!
I bought this for my niece and she loves this! It's a great way to learn

My 2 year old daughter is obsessed with Winnie the Pooh so we are always on the look out for more movies to add to our collection.  Wonderful Word Adventure has a cute storyline and a nice moral lesson at the end, but isn't exactly what I expected it would be about based on the title.  My impression (based on the title) was that the movie would be teaching basic word recognition, but instead it focuses on opposites.  I didn't read the synopsis at all so that fact may have been clear to me if I had, but I feel like once again a Learning Adventures title is misleading (the Pooh ABC's movie focused on rhyming more than the alphabet).  Overall, the educational content being a bit too advanced for my daughter doesn't damper her enjoyment of the movie at all since her real interest is just in seeing Pooh and his friends go on an adventure.
We have counting 1 2 3 and love it, but this video just doesn't provide enough structure to build from.

Excellent video for spending time with my grandchildren whilst she learns words.
I love hanging out with my grandaughter and watching our video together
